Game.Name: Gensou Maden Saiyuuki Retribution - Hi no Ataru Basho de (Japan)
Game.plot: Gensou Maden Saiyuuki Retribution: Hi no Ataru Basho De is a Role-Playing game, developed by PicPac-Airreal and published by Mubik, which was released in Japan in 2001.
Game.Notes: Gensou Maden Saiyuuki Retribution: Hi no Ataru Basho De is a Role-Playing game, developed by PicPac-Airreal and published by Mubik, which was released in Japan in 2001.
